channel.title: Running The Source Problem Please Help?!?!
channel.description:
Did I do something wrong, or is it my computer? PLEASE HELP! [code=java]@echo off title BLANK java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat pause[/code]
When I run the server, like 500 on the things open and don't stop multiplying. It says when it stop multipling.
"Java is not reconized as in Internal or external command, operableprogram, or batch file." Help?

item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“neily00, post:1, topic:411644”]Did I do something wrong, or is it my computer? PLEASE HELP!

@echo off title BLANK java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat pause

When I run the server, like 500 on the things open and don’t stop multiplying. It says when it stop multipling.

“Java is not reconized as in Internal or external command, operableprogram, or batch file.”
Help?[/quote]
Have you set your classpath and path?
